title: Kitten Engineer Redux
Description_Short: [VERY EARLY ALPHA] Kitten Engineer Redux is a tools and utility mod for Kitten Space Agency that displays helpful information, as well as a suicide burn calculator, and a small automatic flight computer.
Description_Long: [VERY EARLY ALPHA] Kitten Engineer Redux is a tools and utility mod for Kitten Space Agency that displays helpful information, as well as a suicide burn calculator, and a small automatic flight computer. Expect some things to not work properly just yet. ModMenu is the only dependency.
author: BarneyTheGod
